NK010(tha)024:1: phur srung lcam dral gyi gnad yig dam can bla chags zhes bya ba bzhugs /
NK010(tha)024:2: dpal chen badz+ra ku m+aa ra la na ma /
NK010(tha)024:3: phur srung lcam dral gyi gnad yig la gsum /
NK010(tha)024:5: srog sngags kyi rnam dbye dang /
NK010(tha)024:9: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na dregs pa can gnas pa ni 'di lta ste /
NK010(tha)024:10: bdud nag po yab yum rol pa'i sras /
NK010(tha)024:11: lha mo nag mo re ma ti mched bzhi dang /
NK010(tha)024:12: de'i ming po ma h+aa k+aa la ste /
NK010(tha)024:13: de dag ri rab kyi byang shar na mtsho mu
NK010(tha)024:14: le ting gi nang nas lcags mkhar nag po'i nang
NK010(tha)024:15: du dug lnga'i rten can shin tu dregs par gnas
NK010(tha)024:16: so // gnod sbyin zangs mdog rgyal po yab yum rol pa'i sras bswe mo bzhi dang /
NK010(tha)024:17: ming po bswe'i skyes bu gdug pa can bzhi ni
NK010(tha)024:18: ri rab kyi lho nub mtsho na bse mtsho mer
NK010(tha)024:19: ba'i dbus na bse mkhar smug po'i dug lnga'i rten
NK010(tha)024:21: srid pa'i ph+y+wa he le yab yum /
NK010(tha)024:22: bshos pa'i sras shwa na mu kha mched bzhi /
NK010(tha)024:23: ming po shel ging dkar po ste ri rab na dug mtsho mer ba dang /
NK010(tha)024:24: dung mkhar dkar po'i nang na dug lnga'i rten can
NK010(tha)024:25: yod pa de na dregs pa yang dag par gnas
NK010(tha)024:26: so // gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi ma bdun dang /
NK010(tha)024:28: dregs pa can chen po drug dang /
NK010(tha)024:29: 'jig rten pa mang po gzhan gyi srog 'phrog cing /
NK010(tha)024:30: dregs pa'i don dang ldan par gnas so //
NK010(tha)024:32: don de lta bu gzigs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
NK010(tha)024:33: dam can gnad la 'bebs pa zhes bya ba'i ting
NK010(tha)024:34: nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nas /
NK010(tha)024:35: nyon cig kar+m+aa he ru ka /
NK010(tha)024:36: dregs pa tsho gsum ming sring 'di //
NK010(tha)024:37: rab tu thugs rjes gdul bar bya //
NK010(tha)024:38: ma btul dregs pa dmyal bar 'gro //
NK010(tha)024:39: btul na sangs rgyas bstan pa ni //
NK010(tha)024:40: rab tu bsrung bya las byed gzhug /
NK010(tha)024:41: ces gsungs te nyid kyi thugs ka nas sras mchog
NK010(tha)024:42: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa phyag na mtshon cha sna
NK010(tha)024:43: tshogs pa thogs pa mang po spros te /
NK010(tha)024:44: des dregs pa can mang po rang dbang med par
NK010(tha)024:45: bkug ste bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa
NK010(tha)024:46: dang / thams cad zhabs 'og tu bcug /
NK010(tha)024:47: sngags kyis gzir bas shin tu nyam thag pa'i sgra phyung ste /
NK010(tha)024:48: e ma dpa' bo thugs rje can //
NK010(tha)024:49: thugs rje chung bas bdag cag gzigs //
NK010(tha)024:50: rang rang zas skal srog gcod lags //
NK010(tha)024:51: de ring phan chad khyed nyid kyis //
NK010(tha)024:52: 'bangs mchi bdag cag rnams la ni //
NK010(tha)024:53: dba' bos 'bangs rnams yang dag stsol //
NK010(tha)024:55: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
NK010(tha)024:56: zil gyis gnon pa'i phyag rgya bstan /
NK010(tha)024:58: rdo rje phur bu lag tu gtad /
NK010(tha)024:59: ming so sor btags te gsang ba'i dbang bskur /
NK010(tha)024:60: ngan song gi chos las ldog pa'i don bstan /
NK010(tha)024:61: chos nyid yang dag pa'i ye shes bstan te /
NK010(tha)024:62: de rnams kyis rig pa'i me tog tu srog snying phul ba ni 'di lta ste /
NK010(tha)024:65: traka rak+sha re ma ti he dun b+h+yo /
NK010(tha)024:66: ma h+aa yak+sha nag mo he dun b+h+yo /
NK010(tha)024:68: gzhan yang rang rang gi sngags mang po phul lo //
NK010(tha)024:72: a dzi ti a pa ra tsit+ta su ki b+ha
NK010(tha)024:73: ya b+ha ra tsit+ta tram yo g+ai shwa ri ya
NK010(tha)024:76: gzhan yang mang po phul lo //
NK010(tha)024:80: dza ya du man d+h+ai shwa ri n+ai la su tsi h'u b+h+yo h'u b+h+yo /
NK010(tha)024:82: gzhan yang mang po phul lo //
NK010(tha)024:85: ma h+aa k+aa la ra tri ye k+aa la r+au pa h'u phata /
NK010(tha)024:87: gzhan yang mang po phul lo //
NK010(tha)024:90: ra sha ni ra sha b+he ku lan shu lan h'u phata /
NK010(tha)024:92: gzhan yang mang po phul lo //
NK010(tha)024:94: k+aa ra ma k+aa ra ya /
NK010(tha)024:95: tri tsa pa la tri la thun /
NK010(tha)024:97: gzhan yang mang po phul lo //
NK010(tha)024:99: h'u ma ma pa shi ku ru ma tam nya ka ra i nan /
NK010(tha)024:101: 'jig rten pa drug la sogs pa mang pos /
NK010(tha)024:102: d+ha ti ma ma shi kram karma ka t+ye ya /
NK010(tha)024:105: yang bdud rtsi dmar po'i rgyud las de dag sgong skyes su bshad nas /
NK010(tha)024:106: shwa na mas su ru su ru badz+ra /
NK010(tha)024:110: phag byin gyis a pa ra /
NK010(tha)024:111: bswe byin gyis a dzi te /
NK010(tha)024:112: ma bdun gyis ma ma pa shi ku ru ma tam nya ka ra i nan /
NK010(tha)024:113: sring bzhis ma ra se na pra marta na ye h'u phata dang /
NK010(tha)024:114: srung ma thams cad kyis d+ha ti ma ma shi kram ka re ya /
NK010(tha)024:117: bdag nyid chen mos ma ma pa shi /
NK010(tha)024:118: sa bdag chen mos a tsit+ta a pa ra sogs /
NK010(tha)024:119: shwa na mas dz+wa la dang /
NK010(tha)024:123: sgos bsgrub shwa na dkar nag gi rgyud las /
NK010(tha)024:127: kri ta bzhi la mu kha'i mtha' rten rbad sngags dang bcas pa dang /
NK010(tha)024:129: da re'i mtha' can gyi kang+ka dang /
NK010(tha)024:133: gnyis pa sngags kyi de kho na nyid bstan pa ni /
NK010(tha)024:134: rnal 'byor chen po le'u bco lnga pa las dam
NK010(tha)024:135: can sde gsum ming po dang bcas pa'i dril bsgrub
NK010(tha)024:136: las spyi'i srog snying yi ge lnga bcu nga gsum
NK010(tha)024:138: bdag nyid ma'i brgyad cu gya drug /
NK010(tha)024:139: shwa na ma'i lnga bcu rtsa drug /
NK010(tha)024:140: shel ging gi bdun cu don brgyad /
NK010(tha)024:141: mgon po'i dgu bcu go lnga /
NK010(tha)024:142: sa bdag ma'i bdun cu rtsa bdun /
NK010(tha)024:143: de dag gi mnan bsreg 'phang ba'i sngags dang bcas bstan cing /
NK010(tha)024:144: khyad par srog snying rnams la ni //
NK010(tha)024:145: yang na spyi ru shes par bya //
NK010(tha)024:146: zhes pas nges don la ye shes kyi lha'i rtsal snang gcig las mi 'da' ba'i phyir /
NK010(tha)024:147: 'di ni rang la dril ba ste //
NK010(tha)024:148: rtsa ba gang la byin med na //
NK010(tha)024:149: 'di ni spogs pa'i kha bskangs yin //
NK010(tha)024:150: zhes pa la sogs sgos sngags spyi la 'gro ba dang /
NK010(tha)024:151: spyi sngags sgos la 'jug pa rdo rje phur pa'i
NK010(tha)024:152: rang lugs yin na rnal 'byor chen po'i le'u dgu
NK010(tha)024:153: pa las / bzlas pa dpa' bo gcig pa'i sngags //
NK010(tha)024:154: dang po bcom ldan phur pa'i rdzas //
NK010(tha)024:155: thams cad 'dus dang ri rab dang //
NK010(tha)024:156: mnan pa khro bo 'dus pa dang //
NK010(tha)024:157: gong bzhin dam can 'dus pa dang //
NK010(tha)024:158: thabs dang shes rab ging mchog dang //
NK010(tha)024:159: rtog pa las kyi sngags bcas pa //
NK010(tha)024:160: rnam bzhi tshang ba bzhi snying ste //
NK010(tha)024:161: dpa' bo gcig la ngal ba med par bzlas //
NK010(tha)024:163: thams cad 'dus pa'am ri rab ni smad las kyi
NK010(tha)024:164: ngo bo stong nyid snying rje zung du 'jug pa'i
NK010(tha)024:165: sgrol ba yin pas de'i byed las ni khrus lung
NK010(tha)024:166: dang / zil gnon gyi bdag nyid can du sngags
NK010(tha)024:167: don gyi gtan la dbab pa'i tshul le'u sum cu
NK010(tha)024:168: dang / pa las / lam h'u lam yab dang yum //
NK010(tha)024:169: k+ai li gong dang h+aum k+aa ra //
NK010(tha)024:170: gdug pa 'khor bcas sngags su bshad //
NK010(tha)024:171: k+ai li 'og ma big dang bcas //
NK010(tha)024:172: gdug byed sras mchog sngags su bshad //
NK010(tha)024:173: s+t+wam b+ha thabs dang shes rab sngags //
NK010(tha)024:174: gnyis med sbyor bas nyon mongs sbyongs //
NK010(tha)024:175: drag po yab yum sgrol bar bshad //
NK010(tha)024:176: mo ha ming la g+ha ya rus //
NK010(tha)024:177: rten la dbab pa'i las su bshad //
NK010(tha)024:178: dzahmh'u bam hoh'i phyag rgya bzhis //
NK010(tha)024:179: rten dang gnyis su med par bshad //
NK010(tha)024:180: dang h'u gis bsdus pa'i sngags //
NK010(tha)024:181: nyon mongs rang dbang med par bshad //
NK010(tha)024:182: b+ha ga wa na ni bcom ldan 'das //
NK010(tha)024:183: sgrol ba'i gtso bo yin par bshad //
NK010(tha)024:184: shi kri yab dang bi kri yum //
NK010(tha)024:185: gnyis med yab yum byang du bshad //
NK010(tha)024:186: badz+ra h'u dang ar bcas pa //
NK010(tha)024:187: yang dag don gyi 'bras bu ste //
NK010(tha)024:188: stong pa chen pos sgrol bar bshad //
NK010(tha)024:189: rang rang 'dzin pa kun bcom nas //
NK010(tha)024:190: dngos med nam mkha'i rang bzhin gnas //
NK010(tha)024:191: zhes pa la rtogs pas bdag bsgral nas thugs rjes
NK010(tha)024:192: gzhan sgrol ba'i mngon spyod kyi lus yongs su rdzogs
NK010(tha)024:193: shing sngags kyi de kho na nyid tshang bas thams
NK010(tha)024:195: srid pa spyi nas gnon pas ri rab kyi sgra zhugs pa ste /
NK010(tha)024:196: stong pa nyid kyi yi ge ste //
NK010(tha)024:197: 'dzin pa stong par sgrol bar bshad //
NK010(tha)024:198: de yis yang dag don rtogs 'gyur //
NK010(tha)024:199: dngos por 'dzin pa rang rang sngags //
NK010(tha)024:200: stong par sgrol ba de nyid do //
NK010(tha)024:202: mnan pa khro bo 'dus pa'i don ni tha mal
NK010(tha)024:203: gyi snang zhen ye shes lha'i sku gsung thugs su
NK010(tha)024:204: byas nas rang gi lus ngag yid gsum rdo rje
NK010(tha)024:205: gsum gyi rang bzhin du tshags su 'dzud pa stod
NK010(tha)024:206: las byang chub la dmigs pas 'khor ba chos nyid
NK010(tha)024:207: du gnon pa ltar 'dir yang des mnan pa ni
NK010(tha)024:209: khro 'dus ni mjug sdud bsgrub sngags te /
NK010(tha)024:210: spyi dpal chen po'i snying po ni //
NK010(tha)024:211: bsnyen pa yin par nga yis bstan //
NK010(tha)024:212: de la khro bo 'dus pa ni //
NK010(tha)024:213: sgrub pa yin par nga yis bstan //
NK010(tha)024:215: de la dam can 'dus pas khong khrar btang bas bzhi snying gcig tu dril ba zhes bya ste /
NK010(tha)024:216: dang po gtso bo'i gsang sngags dang //
NK010(tha)024:217: phyag rgya bzhi dang ming rus dang //
NK010(tha)024:219: bzhi snying dril ba drag tu bzlas //
NK010(tha)024:220: zhes pa'i don sngon chad ngos zin pa nyung ngo //
NK010(tha)024:221: de ltar bzhi snying gcig tu dril bas phur pa
NK010(tha)024:222: bsgrub dka' ba la ngang thun can bsgrub thag nye
NK010(tha)024:223: bar ston pa rtsa rgyud rdo rje khros pa'i don
NK010(tha)024:224: slob dpon chen po pad+ma'i man ngag du gtso bor
NK010(tha)024:227: d+ha ti 'dus pa bsdu yig gsum //
NK010(tha)024:228: ngan sngags yin par nga yis bstan //
NK010(tha)024:230: gsang ba bsdu yig la brten nas dam can nye bar bsnyen cing 'bod pa /
NK010(tha)024:231: nang 'dus pa la brten nas so so'i srog nas drangs shing las la rbad pa /
NK010(tha)024:232: phyi thun sngags la brten nas bsad pa'i las bya ba gsum las /
NK010(tha)024:234: rnal 'byor chen po las sras mchog la dmigs pa dang /
NK010(tha)024:235: dam can la dmigs pa'i bsdu yig gnyis las phyi ma'i don /
NK010(tha)024:236: ka ni sku yi snying po ste //
NK010(tha)024:237: gzugs can bsgral ba'i drag sngags yin //
NK010(tha)024:238: dza ni gsung gi snying po ste //
NK010(tha)024:239: ngag ni sgrol ba'i drag sngags yin //
NK010(tha)024:240: a ni thugs kyi snying po ste //
NK010(tha)024:241: yid ni sgrol ba'i drag sngags yin //
NK010(tha)024:242: ma ni mu ka he zhes bya //
NK010(tha)024:243: shwa na ma yi drag sngags yin //
NK010(tha)024:244: ra ni rak+sha srin mo ste //
NK010(tha)024:245: bdag nyid ma yi drag sngags yin //
NK010(tha)024:246: sa ni bdud kyi bu mo yin //
NK010(tha)024:247: na ni btsan gyi bu mo yin //
NK010(tha)024:248: pra ni gza' yi bu mo yin //
NK010(tha)024:249: mar ni klu yi bu mo yin //
NK010(tha)024:250: ta ni ming po dag yin te //
NK010(tha)024:251: smad kyi stod kyi drag sngags dang //
NK010(tha)024:252: stod kyi bar gyi drag sngags la //
NK010(tha)024:253: sgra yi yi ge bcu gcig gis //
NK010(tha)024:254: bskul ba'i las kyi drag sngags sbyar //
NK010(tha)024:256: de ltar bzhi snying dril ba la sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las thams cad tshang ba'i tshul /
NK010(tha)024:257: spyi ru bstan pa 'di lta ste //
NK010(tha)024:258: ye shes lha yi sngags nyid ni //
NK010(tha)024:259: thams cad kun gyi sku ru bshad //
NK010(tha)024:260: rang rang rtsa ba'i snying po 'di //
NK010(tha)024:261: thams cad kun gyi thugs su bshad //
NK010(tha)024:262: rang rang snying po 'bru re ni //
NK010(tha)024:263: thams cad kun gyi gsung du bshad //
NK010(tha)024:264: rang rang phyi skyor snying po ni //
NK010(tha)024:265: thams cad kun gyi yon tan sngags //
NK010(tha)024:266: dam can bswe mo'i las sngags ni //
NK010(tha)024:267: thams cad phrin las sngags su bshad //
NK010(tha)024:268: de ni dril ba'i snying po yin //
NK010(tha)024:270: gal te rgyud las dngos bstan gyi sku gsung thugs sngags dmigs bsal sbyor na /
NK010(tha)024:272: bud+d+ha k+ai li k+ai la ya k+aa ya badz+ra nan /
NK010(tha)024:273: dz+wa la dz+wa la pra dz+wa la /
NK010(tha)024:274: s+phu ta s+phu ta sarba na sa pa na ye h'u phata /
NK010(tha)024:275: sogs mgor sbyar nas so so'i srog sngags sam /
NK010(tha)024:276: bsdu yig ltar 'dren pa man ngag yin te /
NK010(tha)024:277: h'u k+aa ra yi yi ge bdun //
NK010(tha)024:278: thams cad sbrags pa gsung gi sngags //
NK010(tha)024:279: bdag nyid gtso bo'i yi ge sngags //
NK010(tha)024:280: gzugs su bskyed pa sku yi sngags //
NK010(tha)024:281: bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i yi ge drug /
NK010(tha)024:282: dran par snang ba thugs kyi sngags //
NK010(tha)024:283: de rnams gong gi bar du'o //
NK010(tha)024:284: sku gsung thugs la gtso bor bya //
NK010(tha)024:286: gnyis pa nang 'dus pa ltar rbad pa ni /
NK010(tha)024:287: yang na bskyed pa med par ro //
NK010(tha)024:288: bsnyen pa mi bya rangs pa dril //
NK010(tha)024:289: dang po bdag nyid 'bru bdun dang //
NK010(tha)024:290: de 'og phyag rgya mnan yig gsum //
NK010(tha)024:291: ming rus yi ge gzas par bshad //
NK010(tha)024:292: shwa na'i yi ge bcu drug dang //
NK010(tha)024:293: re ma ti yi rtsa sngags dang //
NK010(tha)024:294: bswe mo'i snying po bcu bdun dang //
NK010(tha)024:295: 'khor ba rtsad gcod yi ge dgu //
NK010(tha)024:296: thams cad tshang ba'i yi ge bdun //
NK010(tha)024:297: dril te rab tu bzlas pa yi //
NK010(tha)024:298: mdangs dang bral bar rab tu nges //
NK010(tha)024:300: badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la ya dzahmh'u bam hoh lam
NK010(tha)024:301: h'u mo ha g+ha ya sri la mu kha dzah
NK010(tha)024:302: shwa na mu kha dzah sing+ha mu kha dzah kri
NK010(tha)024:303: ta mu kha dzah ma tha ma tha badz+ra /
NK010(tha)024:304: trag rak+sha ma he he dun b+h+yo /
NK010(tha)024:305: ma h+aa yak+sha nag mo he dun b+h+yo /
NK010(tha)024:310: ma ra se na pra marta na ye /
NK010(tha)024:311: sarba big nan bam h'u phata /
NK010(tha)024:312: 'di ni yang dag man ngag ste //
NK010(tha)024:313: mgo mjug dril ba'i ngan sngags yin //
NK010(tha)024:314: 'dis ni nyams par gdon mi za //
NK010(tha)024:315: thugs rjes bzungs la gnas spar ro //
NK010(tha)024:318: bsad sngags dang po gtso bo dang //
NK010(tha)024:319: ming rus dngos dang 'dus pa dang //
NK010(tha)024:320: ming po'i sngags bcas bzlas par bya //
NK010(tha)024:321: dam can la sogs lha rnams kyis //
NK010(tha)024:322: rnam par bsad pa'i dgongs pa bya //
NK010(tha)024:323: skabs su thun sngags bcu gnyis kyis //
NK010(tha)024:324: thun phab nges par bsad par bsam //
NK010(tha)024:325: zhes pas bshad ma thag pa'i khong khra 'bying 'jug byas la /
NK010(tha)024:326: sarba big nan gyi gong du ming po'i sngags dngos bstan gcun kyang rung ste /
NK010(tha)024:327: rtsa rgyud las d+ha ti'i ming dngos su smos pas
NK010(tha)024:328: mdung rtse dmar po'i dgongs pa ltar ma ma pa
NK010(tha)024:330: d+ha ti ma ma sogs khong khrar 'jug pa bde ba nyid pad+ma'i bzhed pa yin no //
NK010(tha)024:331: thun sngags bcu gnyis kyi ngos 'dzin ni rnal 'byor
NK010(tha)024:332: chen po'i le'u bco lnga pa las gzhan du ngo
NK010(tha)024:334: de'i nang tshun nas shu shu rak+sha tshal pa la
NK010(tha)024:335: sogs pa'i dum bu 'dra min re sngar gyi yi
NK010(tha)024:336: ge rnying pa tshor sleb kyang yid brtan rung ba
NK010(tha)024:337: dka' zhing rgyud la bshad pa'ang dus thog ha cang
NK010(tha)024:338: rnying pa'i yig skyon che bas re zhig btang snyoms
NK010(tha)024:339: so // gsum pa sgrub pa dngos la gnyis /
NK010(tha)024:342: dang po ni rnal 'byor chen po'i le'u bcu bzhi pa las /
NK010(tha)024:343: dang po nag mo bsgrub bya ba //
NK010(tha)024:344: kha skong mi skong shes par bya //
NK010(tha)024:345: rnal 'byor yon tan ldan pa dang //
NK010(tha)024:346: phur pa'i don rnams shes pa yis //
NK010(tha)024:347: rab tu dben par legs bsgrub bo //
NK010(tha)024:348: 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi ldan pa yi //
NK010(tha)024:349: dbus su bsnyen phur phyogs bzhir phur //
NK010(tha)024:350: nag mo bzhi yi phur pa dgod //
NK010(tha)024:351: thod pa bzhi la thun dang bcas //
NK010(tha)024:352: khyi yi lte khrag nal bu'i sha /
NK010(tha)024:353: bud med mngal khrag sbal pa'i mgo //
NK010(tha)024:354: rims kyi phyi mo rdo sol dang //
NK010(tha)024:355: khrag chen mu zi gtor ma sman //
NK010(tha)024:356: gzhan yang rdzas rnams mang po gsog /
NK010(tha)024:357: rdo rje khros pa la sogs pas //
NK010(tha)024:358: dbus su bdag nyid dpal chen bskyed //
NK010(tha)024:359: 'khor lo bzhi la spun bzhi ste //
NK010(tha)024:360: re ma ti dang re ma du //
NK010(tha)024:361: re ma dza dang re ma dzu //
NK010(tha)024:362: sku mdog rang rang rigs dang bstun //
NK010(tha)024:363: chibs dang yang na rkyang pa ste //
NK010(tha)024:364: rang rang phyag mtshan phur bu bsnams //
NK010(tha)024:365: rgyan dang ldan pa rab tu bskyed //
NK010(tha)024:366: rang bzhin spyan drangs mchod pa 'bul //
NK010(tha)024:367: bstod dang smon lam legs par bya //
NK010(tha)024:368: de nas bdag nyid sngags dang ni //
NK010(tha)024:369: mched bzhi gsang sngags s+w+aa h+aa can //
NK010(tha)024:370: bar bcug bar bzlas srog snying dbrog /
NK010(tha)024:371: nus pa dag dang ldan par bya //
NK010(tha)024:372: bar bar mchod bstod gnad la dbab //
NK010(tha)024:373: rang rang dam rdzas legs par bstab //
NK010(tha)024:374: de la rtags rnams nges pa ni //
NK010(tha)024:375: bud med nag mos dbang bskur dang //
NK010(tha)024:376: bdag la phyag byed mar 'ongs pa //
NK010(tha)024:377: 'di ni grub ste dngos grub blangs //
NK010(tha)024:378: de nas bsad pa'i las bya ba //
NK010(tha)024:379: brub khung lnga ru nges par bya //
NK010(tha)024:380: de nas thod pa ling+ga dang //
NK010(tha)024:381: drag po'i rdzas rnams legs par bya //
NK010(tha)024:382: gab pa'i sngags kyi las bya'o //
NK010(tha)024:383: ming pos dgug sngags shes par bya //
NK010(tha)024:384: rab bskyed mthing nag 'bar ba yis //
NK010(tha)024:385: nyams pa dgug pa'i las rnams bya //
NK010(tha)024:386: sngags la bsad pa'i sngags gdags so //
NK010(tha)024:387: bsad pa la sogs dgongs pa yis //
NK010(tha)024:388: nyams pa nges par bsad par bya //
NK010(tha)024:389: dang po dus la bab drug dang //
NK010(tha)024:390: de 'og bcu gcig dmod pa yi //
NK010(tha)024:391: rdo rje'i tshig bzhi'i gnad la dbab //
NK010(tha)024:392: thun la sogs pa'i sbyor ba bya //
NK010(tha)024:393: rtags byung phur gdab bsreg 'phang gnan //
NK010(tha)024:394: ma grub dus na shi sa bstan //
NK010(tha)024:395: 'di ni ming po'i las yin te //
NK010(tha)024:396: nyams pa bsad pa'i mchog yin no //
NK010(tha)024:397: kha skong las ni mchog sgrub pa //
NK010(tha)024:398: gzhan du gsungs pa nges pa yin //
NK010(tha)024:399: shwa na mu kha'i sgrub pa ni //
NK010(tha)024:400: gong bzhin yon tan ldan par bya /
NK010(tha)024:401: shwa na sgrub pa'i gnas su nges //
NK010(tha)024:402: dkyil 'khor mched bzhi'i tshul du la //
NK010(tha)024:403: gru gsum bcas pa legs par bri //
NK010(tha)024:404: bsnyen phur shwa na'i phur pa ni //
NK010(tha)024:405: dbus la sogs par rab tu dgod //
NK010(tha)024:406: thod chen 'phar spyang wa khyi lnga rnams bsag /
NK010(tha)024:407: rang rang snying dang khrag chen dang //
NK010(tha)024:408: lcags phye zangs phye gser bye dang //
NK010(tha)024:409: rdo phye gtor ma lnga rnams dgram //
NK010(tha)024:410: de nas gong bzhin bskyed pa yang //
NK010(tha)024:411: lcags spyang 'phar ba wa mo dang //
NK010(tha)024:412: khyi mo rang rang gang rigs bya //
NK010(tha)024:413: mche ba can ni bzhi nges par //
NK010(tha)024:414: chibs sam yang na rkyang ba ste //
NK010(tha)024:415: rang rang cod pan phur pa bsnams //
NK010(tha)024:416: khros pa'i tshur du rab tu brtag /
NK010(tha)024:417: spyan drangs la sogs gong bzhin no //
NK010(tha)024:418: bsad sngags gong bzhin bcas pa la //
NK010(tha)024:419: rab tu shwa na'i sngags bcas pa //
NK010(tha)024:420: legs par bzlas la gong bzhin bya //
NK010(tha)024:421: de la rtags rnams nges pa ni //
NK010(tha)024:423: mgo brnyan tshogs la dbang byed pa'o //
NK010(tha)024:424: nus thob dngos grub blang bar bya //
NK010(tha)024:425: de nas bsad pa'i las bya ba //
NK010(tha)024:427: ling+ga legs bca' las rnams bya //
NK010(tha)024:428: shwa na'i ting 'dzin mang po yis //
NK010(tha)024:429: 'gugs pa dag tu nges pa yin //
NK010(tha)024:430: ming pos yang ni de bzhin no //
NK010(tha)024:431: bsad sngags m+aa ra ya bcas sam //
NK010(tha)024:432: bzlas pa shwa na'i tshogs bcas pas //
NK010(tha)024:433: gtod cing za ba'i ting 'dzin bya //
NK010(tha)024:434: bar bar thun rnams brab pa yis //
NK010(tha)024:435: rdzas rnams sprul pa yang sprul gyis //
NK010(tha)024:436: nges par gsod pa'i ting 'dzin bya //
NK010(tha)024:437: smad stod dkyus tshig lnga bcas pa //
NK010(tha)024:438: de 'og bcu gcig mtha' bsgyur ro //
NK010(tha)024:439: stod smad tha ma'i bzhi bcas pas //
NK010(tha)024:440: thugs dam gnad la dbab par bya //
NK010(tha)024:441: sems can gsod pa'i rtags byung na //
NK010(tha)024:442: rtsa ba phur gdab bsreg dang 'phang //
NK010(tha)024:443: mnan pa'i las rnams byas pa yi //
NK010(tha)024:444: nyams pa nges par 'chi ba yin //
NK010(tha)024:445: kha skong gzhan du nges par gsungs //
NK010(tha)024:446: sa bdag chen mo'i bsgrub pa ni //
NK010(tha)024:447: gong bzhin yon tan ldan pa yis //
NK010(tha)024:448: bswe mo bsgrub pa'i gnas su bya //
NK010(tha)024:449: man+dala zla kham bcu drug gam //
NK010(tha)024:451: rang rang rigs dang mthun nam gcig /
NK010(tha)024:452: wa thod bzhi la rtsa sngags bcas //
NK010(tha)024:453: mchog phur lcags phur lnga rnams so //
NK010(tha)024:454: mar khu zhag dang sbrang rtsi rnams //
NK010(tha)024:456: nyung dkar nyung nag zi ra dang //
NK010(tha)024:457: ske tshe la sogs thun rdzas bsag /
NK010(tha)024:458: gzhan yang sman raka gtor ma lnga //
NK010(tha)024:459: mkhas pas legs par gsog pa yin //
NK010(tha)024:460: de nas ting 'dzin bcas pa yis //
NK010(tha)024:461: dpa' bo dpa' mo bsam pa ste //
NK010(tha)024:462: rang rang rigs mthun sku mdog la //
NK010(tha)024:463: bse khrab rgyan bcas phyag mtshan yang //
NK010(tha)024:464: zhags pa phur bu bsnams pa ni //
NK010(tha)024:465: chibs sam yang na rkyangs pa ste //
NK010(tha)024:466: blon mo yang blon bcas pa bskyed //
NK010(tha)024:467: spyan drang la sogs gong bzhin no //
NK010(tha)024:468: dpa' bo'i gsang sngags bcas pa dang //
NK010(tha)024:469: bar du bswe sngags s+w+aa h+aa bcas //
NK010(tha)024:470: bzlas la gong bzhin nus pa dbrog /
NK010(tha)024:471: bar du mchod bstod gnad la dbab //
NK010(tha)024:472: bal mo la sogs rtags byung nas //
NK010(tha)024:473: dngos grub blangs pas nus pa thob //
NK010(tha)024:474: de nas bsad pa'i las bya ba //
NK010(tha)024:476: khros pas las bya bswe mo dgug /
NK010(tha)024:477: de yang ming po'i bla 'gugs sngags //
NK010(tha)024:478: des ni nges par khugs pa yin //
NK010(tha)024:479: bsad sngags m+aa ra ya bcas la //
NK010(tha)024:480: bzlas pas yang sprul sum sprul gyis //
NK010(tha)024:481: nges par bsad pa'i ting 'dzin byas //
NK010(tha)024:482: gong bzhin drug dang bcu gcig dang //
NK010(tha)024:483: bzhi bcas gnad la dbab par bya //
NK010(tha)024:484: thun phab dgongs pa gong bzhin no //
NK010(tha)024:485: phur gdab bsreg 'phang mnam byas na //
NK010(tha)024:487: spogs dang shi sa'i man ngag ni //
NK010(tha)024:488: ma byung mkhas pas rab tu sbyar //
NK010(tha)024:489: kha skor man ngag gzhan du gsungs //
NK010(tha)024:490: 'di ni man ngag nang na mchog /
NK010(tha)024:491: phur pa'i srung ma mthu chen yin //
NK010(tha)024:493: tshul des sgos bsgrub kyi sa bcad legs par shes shing /
NK010(tha)024:494: ming sring so so'i snying po skye rgyud dang /
NK010(tha)024:495: sngags kyi de kho na nyid bshad ma thag pas ston par 'gyur la /
NK010(tha)024:496: de'ang dam can so so'i bsnyen pa them nas bsad pa'i las la 'jug na /
NK010(tha)024:497: gab pa'i sngags kyis las bya'o //
NK010(tha)024:498: zhes pa la sogs pas kha 'phang ba ltar ngan
NK010(tha)024:499: sngags nye bar bsnyen pa dang 'brel dgos pas de'i
NK010(tha)024:500: bca' gzhi rnams tshang bar byas la /
NK010(tha)024:501: dam can ma rang rang gi ming po'i sngags dang
NK010(tha)024:502: sbrel nas bla 'gugs kyi dmigs pa gtso bor 'don
NK010(tha)024:503: pa la bsgrub pa chen po zhes bya ste /
NK010(tha)024:504: ma mo rnam gsum 'dus pa ni //
NK010(tha)024:505: sgrub pa chen po mchog yin te //
NK010(tha)024:506: dgra bo'i bla 'gugs shes par bya //
NK010(tha)024:507: gab sngags ming rus thabs sngags chen //
NK010(tha)024:508: ngan sngags 'dus pas bsgrub chen po //
NK010(tha)024:509: bsad par bya ba'i rim pa yin //
NK010(tha)024:510: zhes sgrub pa chen po'i yang chen po ngan sngags nye bar bsnyen pa yin no //
NK010(tha)024:511: de yang ming sring so so'i sgos sgrub te dam rdzas tshogs par dka' zhing /
NK010(tha)024:512: rtsa sngags kyang rnam grangs mang bas 'dzings che la bsgrub dka' /
NK010(tha)024:513: ma mo grub kyang las mi 'dod pa la shi sa bstan pa dang /
NK010(tha)024:514: ging 'grub kyang 'khu ldog che ba la log gnon gyi man ngag dang /
NK010(tha)024:515: yi ge 'bru bshig gi sdeb la sogs pa ni /
NK010(tha)024:516: ting 'dzin las su mi rung bas 'chun dka' la rtsub cing bka' gnyan pas /
NK010(tha)024:517: phyi sgrub lag len la 'debs sla zhing /
NK010(tha)024:518: bkra shis pa yin pas logs su bstan par bya'o //
NK010(tha)024:519: gal te ming po'i sgos sgrub kyi khungs 'dod na
NK010(tha)024:520: rnal 'byor chen po'i le'u bco lnga pa las rtogs
NK010(tha)024:521: par bya zhing / de bzhin du spogs pa'i cho ga'ang le'u bcu drug pas gsal bar bstan kyang /
NK010(tha)024:522: lag len la 'debs nus pa'i gang zag 'jig rten
NK010(tha)024:523: na dkon pas khyab gdal du spel ba'i gnas ma
NK010(tha)024:524: yin no // bdag nyid 'dun pa lhod pa mngon spyod kyang //
NK010(tha)024:525: don gnyer ches mang rgyud don nus la skyo //
NK010(tha)024:526: bstan don la dmigs gsang por smras na'ang //
